game_description: You are armed with a Wack-A-Mole game and a gun to eliminate your targets in each new gallery. The trick is, you must keep playing Wack-A-Mole to keep your gun loaded. Each level ups the challenge and keeps you on your toes. Take your eyes of the board and it could end it all. Wack-Ammo is a fun throwback to the old light gun games of the 8 bit era. The hand drawn 2D graphics put you inside these classic shooters with the added flare of VR. * 9 Unique Levels * Different Guns & Wackers Each Gallery * Unlock Badges For Your "Wall Of Achievement" With Each Victory *Earned Trophies Come To Life In Your Home Gallery Wack-Ammo is a must play for every Quest owner.
review_1: What a cool looking game. Super fun and unique. I love trying to play wack a mole while aiming at the same time.
